faqs.question: Do I need any email marketing experience?
faqs.answer: No previous experience required! This bootcamp is designed for beginners and intermediate users. We start with fundamentals and progress to advanced strategies.

faqs.question: Which email platforms will we cover?
faqs.answer: We'll cover the major platforms including Mailchimp, ConvertKit, ActiveCampaign, and others. The principles apply across all platforms.

faqs.question: What if I miss a live session?
faqs.answer: All sessions are recorded and you'll get lifetime access to the replays. Watch at your own pace and revisit any sections as needed.

faqs.question: How long is each session?
faqs.answer: General ticket holders get 2-3 PM PST each day. VIP ticket holders get an extra hour from 3-4 PM PST for personalized Q&A.

instructor.name: Sarah Johnson
instructor.title: Email Marketing Expert
instructor.bio: Sarah has helped hundreds of businesses generate millions in revenue through email marketing.
